data.name: Journey of Greed - Cute Skin Pack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC Includes a new skin for all the following characters:

  • Alchemist;
  • Witch Doctor;
  • Mercenary;
  • Trickster;
  • Dancer;
  • Taoist;
  • Stray Cat;
  • Ronin.

FYI:

You need to own the Ronin first before you can use its skin
data.about_the_game:
This DLC Includes a new skin for all the following characters:

  • Alchemist;
  • Witch Doctor;
  • Mercenary;
  • Trickster;
  • Dancer;
  • Taoist;
  • Stray Cat;
  • Ronin.

FYI:

You need to own the Ronin first before you can use its skin
data.short_description: This DLC includes a new skin for all the characters
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
